    • Method Detail

      • buildAdapterMessage

        public org.dom4j.Element buildAdapterMessage(Adapter adapter)

        Creates Dom4j XML document and element representing Adapter according to protocol version implemented in com.iha.emulator.communication.protocol.implemented

        ZeroPointOne (0.1):
        Message contains protocol version, state(data), adapter ID, firmware version, time ( when was message created )

        Specified by:
        buildAdapterMessage in interface Protocol
        Specified by:
        buildAdapterMessage in class AbstractProtocol
        Parameters:
        adapter - adapter model with adapter information needed in protocol
        Returns:
        Dom4j XML element with adapter information

      • buildSensorMessage

        public org.dom4j.Document buildSensorMessage(org.dom4j.Element rootElement,
                                             Sensor sensor)

        Creates Dom4j XML element representing Sensor according to protocol version implementation in com.iha.emulator.communication.protocol.implemented. This element is attached to element given as parameter.

        ZeroPointOne (0.1):
        Message contains sensor/actuator ID, battery value, signal value, values information (type, offset, value).

        Specified by:
        buildSensorMessage in interface Protocol
        Specified by:
        buildSensorMessage in class AbstractProtocol
        Parameters:
        rootElement - root element for sensor element
        sensor - sensor model with sensor information needed in protocol
        Returns:
        Dom4j XML document with sensor information

      • buildRegisterMessage

        public org.dom4j.Document buildRegisterMessage(AdapterController adapterController)

        Creates Dom4j XML document and element representing register message according to protocol version implementation in com.iha.emulator.communication.protocol.implemented

        ZeroPointOne (0.1):
        Message contains protocol version, state(register), adapter ID, firmware version, time ( when was message created )

        Specified by:
        buildRegisterMessage in interface Protocol
        Specified by:
        buildRegisterMessage in class AbstractProtocol
        Parameters:
        adapterController - class with information about Adapter and it's state needed for creating register message
        Returns:
        Dom4j XML document with register message

      • convertInMessageToXML

        public org.dom4j.Document convertInMessageToXML(java.lang.String inMessage)
                                         throws org.dom4j.DocumentException,
                                                java.lang.NullPointerException

        Converts incoming message string to Dom4j document

        Parameters:
        inMessage - incoming message from server
        Returns:
        Dom4j document with parsed message
        Throws:
        org.dom4j.DocumentException - if message cannot be parsed as XML
        java.lang.NullPointerException

      • checkProtocolVersion

        public org.dom4j.Document checkProtocolVersion(org.dom4j.Document inDocument)
                                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                               java.lang.NullPointerException

        Parses message represented in Dom4j document and compares version number from message with version number of instance used to call this method

        ZeroPointOne (0.1):
        Checks, if protocol version in message equals 0.1

        Parameters:
        inDocument - Dom4j XML document containing message from server
        Returns:
        Dom4j document given as parameter
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if version numbers are not equal
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if trying to parse XML element that should be in message, but is not.

      • parseInSensorMessage

        public void parseInSensorMessage(org.dom4j.Document inDocument,
                                 SensorController senderController,
                                 AdapterController adapterController)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                 java.lang.NullPointerException

        Parses message from server to sensor/actuator according to protocol version implementation in com.iha.emulator.communication.protocol.implemented. Used for parsing messages in temporary communication thread ServerController

        ZeroPointOne(0.1):

        • Processes states:
        • update - changes sensor's refresh time, if server sends different from currently set
        Specified by:
        parseInSensorMessage in interface Protocol
        Specified by:
        parseInSensorMessage in class AbstractProtocol
        Parameters:
        inDocument - Dom4j XML document containing response message from server
        senderController - controller of sensor, for which was message sent
        adapterController - controller of adapter, which own sensor
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if sensor ID or time XML element doesn't exist in received message
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if trying to parse XML element that should be in message, but is not.

      • parseInAdapterMessage

        public void parseInAdapterMessage(org.dom4j.Document inDocument,
                                  AdapterController adapterController)
                           throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                  java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Parses message from server to adapter according to protocol version implementation in com.iha.emulator.communication.protocol.implemented. Used for parsing messages in permanent communication thread ServerReceiver

        ZeroPointOne(0.1):

        • Processes states:
        • set - sets new value on sensor with given ID
        • register - response to register message, true if adapter was successfully registered, false otherwise
        • clean - delete sensor with given ID
        • listen - sensor pairing ( only prints message to log )
        Specified by:
        parseInAdapterMessage in interface Protocol
        Specified by:
        parseInAdapterMessage in class AbstractProtocol
        Parameters:
        inDocument - Dom4j XML document containing message from server
        adapterController - controller of adapter, which received message
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if trying to parse XML element that should be in message, but is not.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if message state is unknown or one of the message arguments is wrong (example: sensor ID doesn't exist). More info in exception message
